author: SteveL-MSFT

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: What about Windows 10 "a Next" and WSL?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Getting it into Windows client is a separate effort from Azure which officially only supports Windows Server VMs.  I think the path to WSL is to get it into Ubuntu itself.

title: Get PSCore6 preinstalled in Azure VM images
